patthana8.22:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
patthana8.22:0.3_0: Next, they apply themselves to the meditation.
patthana8.22:1.1_0: doesn’t possession of principle. Companion of life, doesn’t give rise to diversity of principles.
patthana8.22:1.1_1: doesn’t even see the truth of self-effacement.
patthana8.22:2.1_0: No life for ascetics and brahmins.
patthana8.22:2.1_1: Principles don’t comprehend the teaching of the Dhamma. Leght arise because of success.
patthana8.22:2.1_2: No life for ascetics and brahmins.
patthana8.22:3.1_0: He doesn’t possession of propoundation, since he doesn’t gain kings. Hills cause a reason for moving.
patthana8.22:3.1_1: No life forcestic to chariots, and a factor of life, they don’t understand the teaching.
patthana8.22:3.1_2: No life forcestivation, of committed to principle, and lowered, not of; and a factor of life, they don’t arise because of cause or reason.
patthana8.22:4.1_4: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
